gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 109, Knicks 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Knicks, 109-99. Terry Rozier led all scorers with 34 points (8-11 3PT FG), five rebounds and three assists for the Heat, while Jimmy Butler added 17 points, five rebounds and six assists in the victory. Donte DiVincenzo tallied 31 points (6-15 3PT FG), four rebounds, four assists and four steals for the Knicks in the losing effort. The Heat have won their third straight game as they improve to 42-33 on the season, while the Knicks have dropped their last three games as they fall to 44-31.
